   Chris Christie
   stated on November 7, 2012 in a press conference :
   Says "I was the first governor in America to endorse Mitt Romney."

true pants-fire
     * New Jersey
     * Candidate Biography
     * Elections
     * Chris Christie
   By Caryn Shinske November 11, 2012

Chris Christie claims again that he was first governor to endorse Mitt Romney
for president

   When it comes to presidential campaigns, it seems almost no one was as
   supportive of Mitt Romney for president than Gov.

For this fact check we’re focusing on the claim that Christie was the
   first governor in the country to endorse Romney because he’s made the
   claim several times and received a False on the Truth-O-Meter for it.

Our ruling

   Christie was one of the most ardent supporters of Romney for president and
   stated several times in recent months that "I was the first governor in
   America to endorse Mitt Romney."
